extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • getManager

        public static ArenaManager getManager()
        Gets the instance of ArenaManager.
        Returns:
        The instance of the ArenaManager.

      • arenaLoaded

        public Boolean arenaLoaded(int i)
        Checks if the arena is loaded.
        Parameters:
        i - The ID of the arena to check.
        Returns:
        true if loaded, else false.

      • isInGame

        public Boolean isInGame(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player is in a game. Use isSpectating(Player) to check if a player is spectating a game.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        true if in a game, else false.

      • isSpectating

        public Boolean isSpectating(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if the player is spectating a game. Use isInGame(Player) to check if a player is in a game.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        true if spectating, else false.

      • getArena

        public ArenaBase getArena(int id)
        Gets the arena with the specified ID. You should check if this exists first with arenaLoaded(int) or you may get null.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the arena.
        Returns:
        The ArenaBase requested.

      • getArena

        public ArenaBase getArena(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Gets the arena with the specified player, whether playing or spectating. You should check if the player is in a game with isInGame(Player) or spectating with isSpectating(Player) to avoid a null return.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get.
        Returns:
        The arena containing the specified player.

      • getAllLoadedArenas

        public ArrayList<ArenaBase> getAllLoadedArenas()
        Gets a list of all arenaBases currently loaded. Please use wisely as this can cause issues if you change the set!
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all loaded arenaBases.

      • loadArena

        public Boolean loadArena(ArenaBase arenaBase)
        Called when loading an arenaBase, often from another plugin. This will call the ArenaLoadEvent event. If not cancelled, will mark the specified arenaBase as loaded. This will NOT mark any actual arenaBase data!!!! YOU MUST SET THAT YOURSELF!!!
        Parameters:
        arenaBase - The arenaBase to mark as loaded.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.

      • loadArena

        public Boolean loadArena(int id,
                String gameName,
                Boolean useTeams)
        Called when loading an arena. This will call the ArenaLoadEvent event. If not cancelled, this will either load the arena from scratch, or copy the arena from the event.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena to load.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.

      • loadArena

        public Boolean loadArena(ArenaBase arena,
                org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Marks an arena as loaded by another plugin.

        This will NOT call ArenaLoadEvent!!!
        Parameters:
        arena - The arena to mark as loaded.
        plugin - The plugin that arena was loaded by.
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false.

      • unloadArena

        public Boolean unloadArena(ArenaBase arenaBase)
        Called when unloading an arenaBase, often from another plugin. This will call the ArenaUnloadEvent event. If not cancelled, will mark the specified arenaBase as unloaded. This will NOT mark any actual arenaBase data!!!! YOU MUST SET THAT YOURSELF!!!
        Parameters:
        arenaBase - The arenaBase to mark as unloaded.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.

      • unloadArena

        public Boolean unloadArena(int id)
        Called when unloading an arena. This will call the ArenaUnloadEvent event. If not cancelled, this will either unload the arena, or copy the arena from the event.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena to unload.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.

      • reloadArena

        public Boolean reloadArena(int id)
        Called when reloading an arena. This will call the ArenaReloadEvent event. If not cancelled, this will reload the arena.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena to reload.
        Returns:
        true if not cancelled and successful, else false.
